sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Remove all dashboards permissions that contain no dashboard reference.</description> <name>Clean Dashboards Permissions Table</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[/* Delete dashboard permissions records that have no referenced dashboard */ var grDashboardPermissions = new GlideRecord("pa_dashboards_permissions"); grDashboardPermissions.addNullQuery("dashboard"); grDashboardPermissions.query(); while(grDashboardPermissions.next()) { grDashboardPermissions.deleteRecord(); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-07-31 09:59:05</sys_created_on> <sys_id>24ec01adb71003003b67c50eee11a97d</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Clean Dashboards Permissions Table</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Responsive Dashboards" source="com.glideapp.dashboards">b299b4e43cf1311068bcf327dfe37ff8</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_24ec01adb71003003b67c50eee11a97d</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-07-31 10:00:18</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
